divs: Sighting DetailsI was on my front porch when I saw the object moving across the sky in the direction described above. It glowed brightly with a solid white light and disappeared as quickly as it appeared. It had no flashing lights like an airplane has. I have seen this object several times this past summer at different times and from different directions.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Imlay City
There were no other sightings in Imlay City on or around October 25th 2012
Summary: object moved slowly heading ne to e and disappeared suddenly.
